@hellboy1119
That's bullshit. I see you never had a movie in more BD versions, well then prove it, don't just claim. Often I've seen better transfer then US in FRE, GER, POL, RUS, Sony or others. 
You may say though that 40 % of the US transfers are better then other versions, 20 % of the US transfers are worse and 40% of BD-s are just equal in quality.
Besides the differences are almost impossible to notice, or is just a matter of taste (more pixelated but more detailed or less pixelated but less details, or more blueish etc..)
